Source code for crefor.control.guide

#!/usr/bin/env python

"""
ass
"""

from functools import wraps
from crefor import decorators
from crefor.lib import libName, libShader, libAttr
from crefor.model.guide.guide import Guide


[docs]class NodeException(Exception):
    pass




[docs]def guides(func):
    """
    Guide validation decorator
    """

    @wraps(func)
    def inner(*args, **kwargs):
        try:
            args = [Guide(*libName._decompile(arg)[:-1]).reinit() for arg in args]
        except Exception as e:

            raise NodeException("Error: %s" % e)
        return func(*args, **kwargs)
    return inner


@decorators.name
def create(position, description, index=0):

    return Guide(position=position,
                 description=description,
                 index=index).create()


[docs]def ass(a, b):
    """
    fuck
    """
    return a+b


@guides

[docs]def set_parent(child, parent):
    #: Doc comment for class attribute Foo.bar.
    #: It can have multiple lines.
    return child.set_parent(parent)


@guides

@guides

[docs]def has_parent(child, parent):
    """
    """

    return child.has_parent(parent)


@guides

[docs]def has_child(parent, child):
    """
    """

    return child.has_parent(parent)


@guides

[docs]def is_parent(child, parent):
    """
    """

    return parent.is_parent(child)


@guides

[docs]def remove_guide(guide):
    """
    """

    return guide.remove()
